welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ban Chang Phuak, the charming city in northern Thailand known for its rich culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful nature. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the local way of life, and we hope you have a wonderful stay here."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chiang Mai International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Chiang Mai International Airport handles all domestic flights within Thailand.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Chiang Mai International Airport serves all international flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
